summary: Comprehensive testing of multi-language e-commerce platform completed. Backend APIs fully functional (21/21 tests passed). Frontend features working including homepage, product navigation, multi-language support (EN/AR/TR), responsive design, and authentication flow. Minor limitation: cannot test authenticated features without actual login credentials.

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation links not visible on mobile viewport - likely hidden in hamburger menu
ui_bugs.note: This is likely intentional responsive design behavior

passed_tests: Homepage loading with hero section and categories
Product category navigation (Men, Women, Sports, New Arrivals)
Arabic RTL text display and layout
Product listing pages for all categories
Google OAuth login redirect to auth service
